dataKeys.name: flags
dataKeys.label: Flags

dataKeys.name: log
dataKeys.label: Log
dataKeys.postFuncBody:
const CODES = {
    BOOT: 1,
    RESTART: 2,
    CALLING_HOME: 3,
    TIME_SYNC: 4,
    SENSOR_DATA_SUBMITTED: 5,
    SENSOR_DATA_SUBMISSION_ERRORS: 6,
    LOG_SUBMITTED: 7,
    DEVICE_CONFIG_DATA_CRC_ERRORS: 11,
    SLEEP: 12,
    WAKEUP: 13,
    NTP_TIME_SYNC_FAILED: 14,
    BATTERY: 15,
    INT_ENV_SENSOR1: 16,
    INT_ENV_SENSOR2: 17,
    BATTERY_GAUGE: 18,
    RC_PARSE_FAILED: 19,
    RC_INVALID_FORMAT: 20,
    RTC_TEMPERATURE: 21,
    RC_REQUEST_FAILED: 22,
    RC_APPLYING_NEW_DATA: 23,
    RC_WATER_SENSORS_READ_INT_SET_SUCCESS: 24,
    RC_WATER_SENSORS_READ_INT_SET_FAILED: 25,
    RC_CALL_HOME_INT_SET_SUCCESS: 26,
    RC_CALL_HOME_INT_SET_FAILED: 27,
    OTA_REQUESTED: 28,
    OTA_NO_FW_VERSION_SPECIFIED: 29,
    OTA_FW_SAME_VERSION: 30,
    OTA_FW_URL_NOT_SET: 31,
    OTA_MD5_NOT_SET: 32,
    OTA_URL_INVALID: 33,
    OTA_FILE_GET_REQ_FAILED: 34,
    OTA_FILE_GET_REQ_BAD_RESPONSE: 35,
    OTA_FILE_GET_REQ_RESP_EMPTY: 36,
    OTA_UPDATE_BEGIN_FAILED: 37,
    OTA_DOWNLOADING_AND_WRITING_FW: 38,
    OTA_WRITING_FW_COMPLETE: 39,
    OTA_UPDATE_NOT_FINISHED: 40,
    OTA_COULD_NOT_FINALIZE_UPDATE: 41,
    OTA_FINISHED: 42,
    OTA_SELF_TEST_PASSED: 43,
    OTA_SELF_TEST_FAILED: 44,
    OTA_ROLLING_BACK: 45,
    OTA_ROLLBACK_NOT_POSSIBLE: 46,
    FS_SPACE: 47,
    RTC_SYNC: 48,
    TB_CLIENT_ATTR_PUBLISH_FAILED: 49,
    SLEEP_CHARGE: 50,
    SLEEP_CHARGE_FINISHED: 51,
    WATER_QUALITY_MEASURE_FAILED: 52,
    WATER_LEVEL_MEASURE_FAILED: 53,
    SPIFFS_FORMATTED: 54,
    SPIFFS_FORMAT_FAILED: 55,
    WATER_QUALITY_INVALID_RESPONSE: 56,
    WATER_QUALITY_MEASUREMENT_DATA_REQ_FAILED: 57,
    WATER_QUALITY_ZERO_VALS: 58,
    WATER_QUALITY_CRC_FAILED: 59,
    WEATHER_STATION_INVALID_RESPONSE: 61,
    WEATHER_STATION_MEASUREMENT_DATA_REQ_FAILED: 62,
    RC_WEATHER_STATION_READ_INT_SET_SUCCESS: 63,
    RC_WEATHER_STATION_READ_INT_SET_FAILED: 64,
    WAKEUP_SELF_TEST_FAILED: 65,
    WEATHER_STATION_MEASUREMENT_LOG: 66, 
    WATER_SENSORS_MEASUREMENT_LOG: 67,
    SCHEDULE_INVALID_USING_DEFAULT: 68,
    BATTERY_MODE_UNKNOWN: 69,
    WEATHER_STATION_MEASUREMENT_FAILED: 70,
    CALLING_HOME_END: 71,
    MAC_ADDRESS: 72,
    SOIL_MOISTURE_SENSOR_MEASUREMENT_LOG: 73,
    SOIL_MOISTURE_MEASUREMENT_FAILED: 74,
    SOLAR_PANEL_VOLTAGE: 75,
    USING_DEFAULT_DEVICE_CONFIG: 76,
    SLEEP_CHARGE_CHECK: 77,
    SOIL_MOISTURE_INVALID_RESPONSE: 78,
    SOIL_MOISTURE_MEASUREMENT_DATA_REQ_FAILED: 79,
    SOIL_MOISTURE_ZERO_VALS: 80,
    RC_SOIL_MOISTURE_READ_INT_SET_SUCCESS: 81,
    RC_SOIL_MOISTURE_READ_INT_SET_FAILED: 82,
    FO_SNIFFER_SCANNING: 83,
    FO_SNIFFER_SCAN_RESULT: 84,
    FO_SNIFFER_SCAN_FINISHED: 85,
    FO_ENABLED_STATUS: 86,
    FO_DISABLED_RX_FAILED: 87,
    
    GSM_NETWORK_DISCOVERY_FAILED: 100,
    GSM_RSSI: 101,
    GSM_NO_SIM_CARD: 102,
    GSM_GPRS_CONNECTION_FAILED: 103,
    GSM_INIT_FAILED: 104,
    GSM_ON: 105,
    GSM_OFF: 106,
    
    CALL_HOME_WAKEUP_MISSED: 200,
    WAKEUP_CORRECTION: 201,
    WAKEUP_EVENTS_MISSED: 202,
    WATER_LEVEL_RAW_READING: 203
    
    
}

// log_code: message
const MESSAGES = {
	1: "Boot (Version: %s)",
	2: "Device is going to be restarted",
	3: "Calling home",
	4: "Time sync",
	5: "Sensor data submitted (Total entries: %s - CRC failures: %s)",
	6: "Sensor data submission errors (Total requests: %s - Failed requests: %s)",
	7: "Log submitted (Total entries: %s - CRC failures: %s)",
	11: "Device config load failed due to CRC errors",
	12: "Going to sleep (Time awake: %ss - Sleeping for: %ss)" ,
	13: "Waking up (Reason: %s)",
	14: "NTP time sync failed",
	15: "Battery ADC (Voltage: %s mV - Pct: %s%)",
	16: "Internal env. sensor (Temperature: %sC - Rel. Humidity: %s%)",
	17: "Internal env. sensor (Pressure: %shPa - Alt: %sm)",
	18: "Battery gauge (Voltage: %s mV - Pct: %s%)",
	19: "Could not deserialize remote control data",
	20: "Remote control data format invalid",
	21: "RTC temperature (%sC)",
	22: "Remote control request failed (HTTP resp. code: %s)",
	23: "Applying remote control data (New id: %s - Old id: %s)",
	24: "Water sensors read interval set: %s",
	25: "Setting water sensors read interval failed (value: %s)",
	26: "Call home interval set: %s",
	27: "Setting calling home interval failed (value: %s)",
	28: "OTA requested",
	29: "OTA: No fw version specified (current: %s)",
	30: "OTA: Provided fw is the same version as current (current: %s)",
	31: "OTA: FW url not provided or empty.",
	32: "OTA: MD5 not set",
	33: "OTA: Invalid url",
	34: "OTA: File GET request failed (HTTP resp. code: %s)",
	35: "OTA: File GET request returned error (HTTP resp. code: %s)",
	36: "OTA: File GET request returned empty response (HTTP resp. code: %s)",
	37: "OTA: Update begin() failed (Error code: %s)",
	38: "OTA: Downloading and writing fw to partition (Size: %s)",
	39: "OTA: Writing fw complete (Total: %s - Written: %s)",
	40: "OTA: Update not finished successfully (Error code: %s)",
	41: "OTA: Could not finalize update (Error code: %s)",
	42: "OTA: Process complete",
	43: "OTA: Self test passed",
	44: "OTA: Self test failed",
	45: "OTA: Rolling back to old fw",
	46: "OTA: Rolling back to old fw is not possible",
	47: "File system space (Used: %s B - Free: %s B)",
	48: "RTC Sync (Time before sync: %s)",
	49: "Could not publish client attributes (HTTP resp: code: %s)",
	50: "Entering sleep charge mode",
	51: "Sleep charge finished, battery reached threshold",
	52: "Water quality measuring failed",
	53: "Water level measurement failed",
	54: "SPIFFS formatted successfully (Bytes before format: %s)",
	55: "SPIFFS format failed",
	56: "Water quality: invalid response (Length: %s, Data: %s)",
	57: "Water quality: measurement data request failed (Command: aD%s)",
	58: "Water quality: returned all zero values",
	59: "Water quality: CRC failed",
	60: "Water quality: measurement command response (Secs to wait: %s - Measurement vals: %s)",
	61: "Weather station: invalid response",
	62: "Weather station: measurement data request failed (Command: aD%s)",
	63: "Weather station read interval set: %s",
	64: "Setting weather station read interval failed (value: %s)",
	65: "Wake up self-test failed",
	66: "Weather station logging measurement",
	67: "Water sensors logging measurement",
	68: "Invalid schedule provided, using default",
	69: "Battery mode unknown, assuming normal",
	70: "Weather station measurement failed",
	71: "Calling home end",
	72: "MAC address",
	73: "Soil moilsture logging measurement",
	74: "Soil moisture measurement failed",
	75: "Solar panel voltage: %s mV",
	76: "Invalid device config, using default",
	77: "Sleep charge: Checking battery status",
	78: "Soil moisture: invalid response",
	79: "Soil moisture: measurement data request failed (Command: aD%s)",
	80: "Soil moisture: returned all zero values",
	81: "Soil moisture read interval set: %s",
	82: "Setting soil moisture read interval failed (value: %s)",
	83: "FO Sniffer: Scanning",
	84: "FO Sniffer: Found weather station ID 0x%s",
	85: "FO Sniffer: Scanning finished",
	86: "FO Sniffer enabled status - Previous: %s - New: %s",
	87: "FO: RX failure threshold reached, disabling FO",
	
	100: "GSM: Network discovery failed",
	101: "GSM: RSSI (%s)",
	102: "GSM: Failed to detect SIM card.",
	103: "GSM: GPRS connection failed",
	104: "GSM: Modem init failed",
	105: "GSM: On",
	106: "GSM: Off",
	
	200: "Call home wake up missed, executing immediately",
	201: "Correcting wake up time, sleeping for %s seconds",
	202: "Missed Wake up events detected, handling them immediately",
	203: "Raw water level reading: %s"
}

let [log_code, meta1, meta2] = value.split(",");

let msg = "";

if(log_code in MESSAGES)
{
	msg = MESSAGES[log_code];
	
	//
	// Convert meta data to a more readable format for certain codes
	//
	switch(parseInt(log_code))
	{
	case CODES.WAKEUP:
	    let wakeup_reasons = [];
	    if(meta1 & 1)
	        wakeup_reasons.push("Call Home");
	    if(meta1 & 2)
	        wakeup_reasons.push("Water sensors");
	    if(meta1 & 4)
	        wakeup_reasons.push("Weather station");
	    
	    meta1 = wakeup_reasons.join(" - ");
	   
	    break;
	case CODES.RTC_SYNC:
	    
	    meta1 = (new Date(meta1 * 1000)).toLocaleString();
	    
	    break;
	}

	// Replace both meta vals if they exist
	if(typeof meta1 !== "undefined" && meta1.length)
		msg = msg.replace("%s", meta1);
	if(typeof meta2 !== "undefined" && meta2.length)
		msg = msg.replace("%s", meta2);
}
else
{
	msg = "UNKNOWN LOG TYPE";
}

return msg;
